segments.text: I can't believe how calm the woman is while the sink is overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she doesn't even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the children sneaking cookies, and it makes me a bit angry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool, and it looks so unsafe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is encouraging him, looking up at him like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just drying dishes, completely unaware of what's going on behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like shouting at them to stop, to be careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting wetter and wetter, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the garden outside, it looks so serene compared to the chaos in here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone is going to get hurt if they don't pay attention soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
